name: CreateFolderHubspotCrm
description:
Creates a folder in HubSpot CRM with specified details.

Use this tool to create a new folder in HubSpot CRM by providing the necessary information for the folder you want to create.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: The name of the folder to be created in HubSpot CRM.

value_schema.description: The name of the folder to be created.

parameters.name: parent_folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder where the new folder will be created. Defaults to root folder (ID: 0) if not specified.

value_schema.description: The folder this should be created in, if not specified will be created in the root folder 0.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: parentFolderId
parameters.description: The folder this should be created in, if not specified will be created in the root folder 0.

value_schema.description: The folder this should be created in, if not specified will be created in the root folder 0.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the folder to be created.

value_schema.description: The name of the folder to be created.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
